settings.label: Header Message
settings.default: Your cart is eligible for Special Financing with the Kaneâ€™s Furniture credit card.*

settings.label: Subheader Message
settings.default: *Subject to credit approval. Minimum monthly payments required.

settings.label: Details
settings.default: With 60 month financing Limited Time. Minimum purchase amount of $5,999.99. 20% down payment to be paid by credit card. All promotional discounts are excluded. Click for important monthly payment and offer information.

settings.label: Title
settings.default: No Interest if paid in full within 6 Months

settings.label: Details
settings.default: On qualifying purchases made with your Kanes Furniture credit card. Interest will be charged to your account from the purchase date if the promotional purchase is not paid in full within 6 months. Minimum monthly payments required. LEARN HOW

settings.label: Title
settings.default: No Interest if paid in full within 12 Months^

settings.label: Details
settings.default: On qualifying purchases made with your Kanes Furniture credit card. Interest will be charged to your account from the purchase date if the promotional purchase is not paid in full within 12 Months. Minimum monthly payments required. LEARN HOW

settings.label: Title
settings.default: No Interest if paid in full within 36 Months^

settings.label: Details
settings.default: On qualifying purchases made with your Kanes Furniture credit card. Interest will be charged to your account from the purchase date if the promotional purchase is not paid in full within 36 Months. Minimum monthly payments required. LEARN HOW

settings.label: Title
settings.default: No Interest if paid in full within 60 Months^

settings.label: Details
settings.default:
On purchases of $5999.99 or more made with your Kanes Furniture credit card. Limited Time. Equal monthly payments required for 60 months. The Kanes Furniture Credit Card cannot be used for the required 20% deposit. The order is excluded from all promotional discounts. LEARN HOW

This financing option has the following prerequisites:

  • Minimum purchase amount of $5999.99
  • 20% down payment paid by credit card
  • The order is excluded from all promotional discounts

settings.label: Description
settings.default: The selected financing option is excluded from all promotional discounts and requires a 20% down payment by credit card. First, we will submit 80% of the cart total for approval by Synchrony. Upon approval of financing, we will require payment of the 20% down payment by credit card. Successful authorization of the down payment will complete your order.
